description:
Here is my animation of AR 2781 from yesterday.  Data was suboptimal and I tossed several files. I had variable seeing and clouds.

I captured 10s video every 30 s for 40 minutes

Processing flow:
Stacked in AS3!
Aligned in ImPPG
Transfered to PI (batched processed with process container and image container)
-Dynamic Crop (large crop)
-ABE (subtract, normalize)
ImPPG for deconvolution and sharpening (batch processing). This could be performed in PI.  I had to realign in ImPPG since I wasnt happy with initial results.
Back to PI 
-RGB convert (color
-Color
-Histogram adjustment
-PIPP to make .gif (20fps)

Solar equipment is pretty pricey so I decided to try and upload my data for people to  try it.  I am including a link to my master stacked calibrated frames (see link above).  If you publish please mention where you got the data.  As you will notice I had a pretty big crop for the animation.

If you have PI and want to download ImPPG (outstanding software for solar), here is a tutorial by Chuck. (This is a great tutorial).  Obviously it focuses on prom but you can use the same principles. I find ImPPG is a little easier to fine tune deconvolution and sharpening.

Chuck Astrophotography tutorial
https://youtu.be/VXijbjkclMc

Warren's excellent tutorial
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AI2PGDVrxk0&feature=youtu.be

Here is an excellent tutorial on ImPPG
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0LpiVFcabbo
title: AR 2781 animation in Ha with data
